title: BRIEF-Hangzhou Liaison Interactive lowers amount of share issue size
text:
BRIEF-Hangzhou Liaison Interactive lowers amount of share issue size Sept 24 
Sept 24 Hangzhou Liaison Interactive Information Technology Co Ltd 
* Says revises share issue size to up to 4.8 billion yuan ($752.14 million) from up to 6.0 billion yuan previously 
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1LyY76r 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3818 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
